name: Hysterie
description:
A procedurally generated game realized in 48 hours for the Digital Art Jam 2018 edition (a collaboration between the Centre George Pompidou and the CNAM-ENJMIN).

We are 5 students and based this experience on our personal visit of the 4th floor of the museum of contemporary art of Paris. Please feel free to give us your feedbacks and interpretations!

Use a controller for a better experience.

Engineering

Thomas BAILLY-SALINS                 École 42,
Cinthia GODINHO                            ICAN, Paris

Design

Sara "s0r0" JAAFAR                        CNAM-ENJMIN, Angoulême
Corinne  LE TOQUIN                      CNAM-ENJMIN, Angoulême
Yannis MOULAY                             CNAM-ENJMIN, Angoulême

Softwares

Unity, MagicaVoxel, Adobe Photoshop,  Audacity.   Sound materials  mostly come from freesound.org and mynoise.net
